post:
BulletHost is Back with a Full Magazine of Offers in the Netherlands!

bullethost, dedi, dedicated, netherlands, shared March 3, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Bullet Host has returned with a set of dedicated and reseller hosting offers for you to consider.  We had them on back on January 14, 2021 when they were offering a variety of Netherlands options and now they’ve returned with an even broader spectrum.

Can they really “keep your servers online, no matter what”?  Comments were positive last time, so if you’re looking for shared or dedicated options in the Netherlands, give them a think.

They are registered in Bulgaria (206112702). Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept Bitcoin, Paypal, Credit/Debit cards, and Perfect Money.  You can also talk to them on their Discord.

If you have been a customer of Bullet Host or you give them a try out now, please comment below.

Now read more to see the offers!

Dedicated #1

  • 8GB DDR4 RAM
  • Intel Xeon 6 Core E5-1650-V3 3.50Ghz
  • 2x 480GB SSD
  • Software RAID
  • ~15TB Bandwidth
  • 1Gbps uplink
  • 1 IPv4 (Per request)
  • IPMI: yes
  • $75/month
  • [ORDER]
